snippet.title: Bloxiq Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Challenge Your Brain From ALL Directions

Bloxiq takes the classic concept of color matching and turns it on its head.

Manipulate blocks to connect four or more of the same color over 100 levels of mind bending 3D trials. Learn the intricacies of a never before seen, spatially engaging matching mechanic to conquer obstacles such as bombs, locks and hidden blocks in devilishly addicting challenges. Marvel at your own cleverness as you complete mind-bending puzzles in one of the most unique games on the PlayStation Vita.

Get the Game Now on
PS Vita - https://store.playstation.com/en-ca/product/UP0075-PCSE00663_00-BLOXIQGAMENA0001
Google Play - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.blotinteractive.Bloxiq&hl=en
App Store - https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/bloxiq/id981576068?ls=1&mt=8
Steam - http://store.steampowered.com/app/510710/Bloxiq_VR/
Steam VR - http://store.steampowered.com/app/510710/Bloxiq_VR/
